headline: ConocoPhillips (NYSE:COP) Advises Vote Against Emissions Proposal Amid 5% Price Drop Over Last Month
summary: ConocoPhillips (NYSE:COP) experienced a 5% price decline over the last month, amid significant shareholder activism concerning its emissions reduction targets. The National Legal and Policy Center has submitted proposals to remove these targets, with ConocoPhillips advising a vote against them at the upcoming annual meeting. Simultaneously, the company plans governance changes, including eliminating supermajority voting provisions, indicating potential strategic shifts. This internal focus...

headline: SCHD: A Strong Buy After The Rebalancing
summary: SCHD's recent rebalancing added 20 new stocks, focusing on cyclical sectors like Energy and Financials. Read why SCHD ETF is ideal for passive income investors.
